personality.traits: I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.
personality.ideals: Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others.
personality.bonds: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
personality.flaws: I made a terrible mistake in battle that cost many lives, and I would do anything to keep that secret.

character_appearance_description:
Aldric stands tall with a soldier's bearing, his posture straight and confident. His face bears the weathered look of someone who has seen battle, with a thin scar across his left cheek. He keeps his brown hair cropped short in military fashion, and his blue eyes hold a steady, determined gaze.

His chain mail is well-maintained but shows signs of heavy use, and he carries himself with the quiet confidence of an experienced warrior.
backstory:
Born to a farming family in the borderlands, Aldric enlisted in the local militia at sixteen after his village was raided by bandits. His natural aptitude for combat and unwavering courage quickly earned him recognition, and he rose through the ranks to become a sergeant.

During a border skirmish three years ago, Aldric led a patrol into an ambush. Though he fought valiantly and saved several of his men, the battle cost the lives of half his squad. The weight of those deaths haunts him still.

Seeking redemption and purpose, Aldric left the military and turned to adventuring. He hopes that by protecting the innocent and fighting evil, he can honor the memory of those who fell under his command.

allies_organizations.name: The Iron Brotherhood
allies_organizations.description:
A loose fellowship of former soldiers turned adventurers. Members share information about threats, offer shelter to each other, and occasionally band together for dangerous missions.

Aldric maintains contact with his former captain, now retired, who serves as his mentor and confidant.

treasure: Silver locket with portrait of parents
Letter of commendation from former commander

header.name: Flamebrand Longsword
header.subtitle: A blade forged in dragonfire, its edge forever burning

content.text: This elegant longsword has a blade of dark steel with veins of orange-red running through it like cooling magma. When drawn, the edge ignites with flickering flames that cast dancing shadows. The crossguard is shaped like two dragon wings, and the pommel bears a ruby that glows with inner fire. The leather-wrapped grip remains cool to the touch despite the blade's heat.

items.name: Flaming Blade
items.desc: Deals an additional 1d6 fire damage on hit

items.name: Flame Light
items.desc: Sheds bright light 20 ft, dim light 20 ft more (command word)

items.name: Never Cold
items.desc: You have resistance to cold damage while holding the sword

items.name: Magical Weapon
items.desc: Attacks count as magical for overcoming resistance

content.text: The blade remembers the dragon that forged it. In battle, I swear I can hear it roar.
content.attribution: — Sir Kaelan Ashford, Knight of the Ember Order

bullets: Average per hit: ~12 damage with +3 STR

items.name: Damage Calculation (Two-Handed)
bullets: Average per hit: ~14 damage with +3 STR

items.name: Flame Burst (1/day)
bullets: As a bonus action, wreath the blade in intense flame
Next attack deals an extra 2d6 fire damage
Target must make DC 15 DEX save or catch fire
Burning target takes 1d6 fire at start of each turn
Can use action to extinguish flames

items.name: Ignite (At will)
bullets: Touch the blade to a flammable object to ignite it
Can light torches, campfires, or oil without tinder

blocks.text: Flamebrand was forged by the red dragon Scoraxes as a gift for a human knight who saved his wyrmling from hunters. The dragon breathed fire upon the blade for seven days and nights, infusing it with elemental power.

items.title: The Frozen Keep
items.desc: Sir Kaelan used the blade's warmth to survive a month trapped in ice

items.title: Battle of Ashford
items.desc: The sword's flames ignited a troll's regenerating wounds

items.title: The Dragon's Return
items.desc: Scoraxes recognized the blade and spared the current wielder
